name: booklogr
description: Booklogr is a lightweight reading tracker app that helps users log the books they read, rate them, and track progress. Its clean web interface makes it accessible across devices, and it's easy to self-host.
features: Reading Tracker: Log books you've read with detailed information. Complete reading history.
Rating System: Rate and review books you've finished. Share your opinions.
Progress Tracking: Monitor reading progress for current books. Stay motivated.
Clean Interface: Simple, focused web UI for easy use. Distraction-free.
Cross-Device: Access your reading log from any device. Read anywhere.
Self-Hosted: Keep reading data private on your server. Complete privacy.
Lightweight: Fast, responsive performance. Efficient design.
Easy Setup: Quick deployment with minimal configuration. Start tracking quickly.
